商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖 T 恤襯衫
留言內容: Bad fit around shoulders, like the distance from shoulders to neck is to short and feels tight and pulls. The color green and flowers are dark and is not flattering. Had to return.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: A Red 0
留言內容: I love this blouse. It is light and pretty. I am 5'6" and 130. I got a Red long-sleeved blouse in size small. The material is very light. I like the cut of the material which hints at my figure yet hangs loosely without hanging like a bag. The collar shows some cleavage when I'm sitting and leaning forward which is not what I usually go for but it is just a peak so I do not feel like it is uncomfortably revealing. I read reviews that people write that the sleeve cuffs are tight. I have thinner than average lower arms so this is not an issue for me personally but it is true that the cuffs have no elastic and no give. I do have long arms and the sleeves ride up sometimes but not to the point that it annoys me at all. The "red" blouse is really very pink. It is beautiful with my skin tones and perfect for spring.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: A Multicolor
留言內容: Looks NOTHING like the picture.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: A Multicolor
留言內容: The product material used was cheap didn't fit like photo, The item looks like something you would buy it the dollar store.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: A Red 0
留言內容: I really like this top.  Color is very pretty and it fits nice.  It's very lightweight and feels very feminine on.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: A Green
留言內容: This is a very nice blouse. Sadly, it runs small. If you normally wear a large, order xlarge. I ordered per the sizing guide where I should have had room but it was skin tight, particularly in the bust area.The blouse is lined, so no worries about seeing too much. The material is a bit scratchy on the outside. But, since the inner bodice of the blouse is lined, it shouldn't bother you there. The sleeves aren't lined but a very roomy. If you have skin sensitivity issues, the sleeve may or may not bother you.The color is more mint green with  white and deep cherry/burnt sienna colored flowers.  The photo makes it look like a mint green with a light pink highlight on a white background.  The blouse I received was a mint green background with white pedals and dark cherry/burnt sienna blossoms.  Although it was different than what I saw pictured, I still really liked the blouse. The colors were still in beautiful balance. And, it would have still been very complimentary to the outfit that I was pulling together.Like I said in the beginning of this review,  this runs small. So, if you like a bit of wiggle room or maybe want to belt it, as I did, order a size up.I hope this review helps you when making your purchase.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: A Red 0
留言內容: Pro: Style—current with the ruffle-y, feminine look this season; looks good worn not tucked in—hides stomach; lined so totally opaque; elastic cuffs for pushing up to wash dishes.Con: pattern isn’t as crisp and bright as pictures; fabric is not suitable for weather over 70-75 degrees, it doesn’t breathe at all; neckline opening goes low enough to show edges of bra. I definitely feel it should be washed in a bag: the fabric is the type whose steams will ravel apart. I don’t suggest washing by hand because who would? not me!PS: I bought a large from reviews—a medium would have been better, so true to size in the red/pink flower pattern.

留言內容: I've ordered three of these shirts because I like how they fit.  But it's important to know that the color you get will not look like the photo.  I ordered "green" in the short sleeve version, and it came as a very muted green (very pale, almost olive).  The recent one I ordered, which is "orange", looked like a pale orange in the photo but it arrived and the orange is very bright.  So, as long as you're not married to what the online photos look like, you won't be disappointed with the fit.  They are very comfortable.
